resources.string: The Bella is a mixed breed dog–a cross between the Australian Shepherd and Corgi, and typically, the Miniature Australian Shepherd and the Pembroke Welsh Corgi. Friendly, energetic, and playful, these mixed breed herding dogs make great companions for the whole family.
The Lucy is a purebred dog from France. These pups are intelligent, friendly, and active, which are great qualities for a hound dog.
The Daisy is a cute pup. These pups are intelligent, friendly, and active, which are great qualities for a hound dog.
Lola like this pup, can be a variety of solid colors, including blues, grays, silvers, browns, cafe-au-laits, apricots and creams.
Look how little this Max pup is! Just you wait, though; once they\'re grown and trained, these dogs are some of the smartest around.
Those big dark eyes, that sweet expression! It’s no surprise that Buddy owners have been so devoted to their pups for thousands of years.
What\'s more beautiful . . . this Charlie pup or the field of flowers she sits in? As much as we love Spring, we think this one\'s an easy choice.
This Rocky has a lot of floof…and the attitude to go with it. Poms are known for being cocky, animated companions with extroverted personalities.
